website_summaries.verdict: This 6.8-ounce bottle of cleanser eliminates oil from mens’ faces, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.
pros: Oil and paraben free, this face wash is an effective daily cleanser
Rids oily skin of dirt and toxins to keep breakouts at bay
cons: Does not do much in the way of exfoliating

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the daily face cleansing
customer_reviews.text: Like the deep clean face scrub, this stuff is fantastic. It provides a gentle cleansing and doesn’t dry your face out like regular soap. Guys...don’t use soap to wash your face; use this instead! Typically lasts about 2-3 months and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Dirty Sweaty Manly face feels Tingly and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loves it. Says it feels "Tingly" and makes his face feel clean. We live in 115 degree Arizona and he's a mechanic so his face is constantly covered in dirt and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry rough skin and after shaving
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling with a particular patch of skin roughness on my forehead and baggy under eyes. This product is the only one I’ve found that really works on both issues. Hydrated very well. Excellent after a shave to keep skin smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash, but the scent isn't really for me
customer_reviews.text: The performance for the price is good. My face feels clean but not dry when I get out of the shower and my face is typically oily. In my opinion, the scent is strong but not terrible, however in the future when I finish this bottle I will probably look for a non-scented or less scented face wash. I think the scent is a little distracting when I put on a cologne because I can still pick up on the scent of the wash. If you're looking for a face wash with a masculine type cologne and cleans your face without leaving that drying feeling, than this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Lot of suds!
customer_reviews.text: Bearded male here. Let me say a little dab is all you need to soap up your face. A line of soap about 1 -1/2" long on a was cloth is all you need. Having a beard my face it suds up more than a clean shaven man. Pleasant scent. Non-Itch formula. I bought a 5 oz tube at a local store and will probably buy this product again...
